channel.title: Initial setup Whonix-Gateway
channel.description:
Hi there,
After following the wiki instructions to get Whonix-Gateway+WS running, I was not getting any sign of being connected and not being able to use ping makes things harder :slight_smile:
Turns out that I needed to run `sudo setup-dist` in Whonix-Gateway to get things moving! After running that everything is running smooth. If this is the way to get it working, I think it should be included in the wiki. It can also be that `whonixcheck` and/or `setup-dist` should autostart in the first run but that didn't happen in my case (16.0.3.7). It did autostart in Whonix-Workstation.

item.title: Initial setup Whonix-Gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Does this only happen when using https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Command_Line_Interface_(CLI)?

I didn’t use that. Did you test if setup-dist autostarts when using KVM CLI? @HulaHoop

Read full topic

item.title: Initial setup Whonix-Gateway
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Ni4:

It can also be that whonixcheck and/or setup-dist should autostart in the first run but that didn’t happen in my case (16.0.3.7)

Yes it should autostart. Maybe it’s a one off bug this time.

Read full topic
